title: How to fix the "Parse failure: Unterminated string constant" error
description:
I ran into this error with a student of mine, running Astro on Windows (could not replicate on macOS), after running npm run dev.
After much ğŸ¤” we solved by renaming the parent folder, which apparently had a strange character, perhaps non-ASCII.
If you run into this problem, try renaming the folder you are running (or perhaps a parent folder in the path) to just ASCII text, like â€œtestâ€
